sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import {
    View, 
    Text, 
    StyleSheet,
    Image,
    TouchableOpacity,
    FlatList,
    ScrollView
} from "react-native";
import {icons,COLORS, FONTS, SIZES,images} from "../constant";


const Home = () => {
  const jd1RetroChicago = {
    id: 0,
    name: "Jordan 1 Retro Chicago",
    img: images.jd1chicago,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$921",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
}
const jd1RetroHighSatinShatteredBackBoard = {
    id: 1,
    name: "Jordan 1 Retro High Satin Shattered BackBoard",
    img: images.jd1RetroHighSatinShatteredBackBoard,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$400",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
}
const jd1MidYellowToeBlack = {
    id: 2,
    name: "Jordan 1 Mid Yellow Toe Black",
    img: images.jd1MidYellowToeBlack,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    type: "RUNNING",
    retail: "$195",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
}
const jd1RetroTop3 = {
    id: 3,
    name: "Jordan 1 Retro Top 3",
    img: images.jd1RetroTop3,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    type: "RUNNING",
    retail: "$195",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
}
const jd1RetroHighHyperRoyalSmokeGrey = {
    id: 4,
    name: "Jordan 1 Retro High Hyper Royal Smoke Grey",
    img: images.jd1HyperRoyal,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    type: "RUNNING",
    retail: "$299",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
}
const jd1RetroHightShadow = {
    id: 5,
    name: "Jordan 1 Retro High Shadow 2.0",
    img: images.jd1Shadow,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    type: "RUNNING",
    retail: "$214",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
}
const jdRetroHighTravisScott = {
    id: 6,
    name: "Jordan Retro High Travis Scott",
    img: images.jdRetroHighTravisScott,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$1460",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [6, 7, 8, 10],
    brands:"Air Jordan"
  }
const jdRetroHighDior =  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Jordan Retro High Dior",
    img: images.jdRetroHighDior,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$7207",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10],
    brands:"Air Jordan",
  }
const jd1LowMocha =   {
    id: 8,
    name: "Jordan 1 Low Mocha",
    img: images.jd1LowMocha,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$141",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [3, 4, 5, 8, 9],
    brands:"Air Jordan",
  }
const jd1MidLightSmoke =  {
    id: 9,
    name: "Jordan 1 Mid Light Smoke",
    img: images.jd1MidLightSmoke,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$111",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 8, 9],
    brands:"Air Jordan",
  }
const jd1HighLuckyGreen =   {
    id: 10,
    name: "Jordan 1 High Lucky Green",
    img: images.jd1HighLuckyGreen,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$300",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [4, 7, 8, 9],
    brands:"Air Jordan"
  }
const jd1LowTravisScottFragment =  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Jordan 1 Low Travis Scott Fragment",
    img: images.jd1LowTravisScottFragment,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$1032",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
    brands:"Air Jordan",
  }
const jd1UniversityBlue = {
    id: 12,
    name: "Jordan 1 University Blue",
    img: images.jd1UniversityBlue,
    date:"Jul 28, 2022",
    retail: "$541",
    resell:"n/a",
    size: [5, 6, 8, 9],
    brands:"Air Jordan",
  }

const tabView = [
    {
        id: 0,
        name: "Upcoming",
        shoes: [
            jd1RetroHighSatinShatteredBackBoard,
            jd1RetroChicago, 
            jd1RetroTop3,
            jd1LowTravisScottFragment,
            jdRetroHighDior
        ]
    },
    {
        id: 1,
        name: "Popular",
        shoes: [
            jd1MidYellowToeBlack,
            jd1RetroHighHyperRoyalSmokeGrey,
            jdRetroHighTravisScott,
            jd1HighLuckyGreen
        ]
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        name: "Past",
        shoes: [
            jd1RetroHightShadow,
            jd1LowMocha,
            jd1UniversityBlue,
            jd1MidLightSmoke
        ]
    },
]

const [tab, setTab] = React.useState(tabView)
const [selectedTab, setSelectedTab] = React.useState(0);

  function renderTabView () {

    const renderTab =({item}) => {
      return(
        <TouchableOpacity style = {[item.id == selectedTab ? style.buttonActive : style.button]}
        onPress = {() =>  setSelectedTab(item.id)}
        >
          {
            selectedTab == item.id &&
            <Text style= {{color:COLORS.black}}>{item.name}</Text>
          }
          {
            selectedTab != item.id &&
            <Text style={{color: COLORS.gray}}>{item.name}</Text>
          }
        </TouchableOpacity>
      )
    }

    return (
      <View style ={{flex:1, paddingLeft:SIZES.padding}}>
        <FlatList 
        data={tab}
        showsHorizontalScrollIndicator = {false}
        renderItem = {renderTab}
        horizontal
        />
      </View>
    )
  }
  function renderDataTabView () {
    var shoes = []

    let selectedShoes = tabView.filter(a => a.id == selectedTab)

    if (selectedShoes.length > 0) {
      shoes = selectedShoes[0].shoes
    }
    const renderData = ({item}) => {
      return (
        <View style = {{marginVertical:SIZES.base,alignItems:'center'}}>
          <TouchableOpacity style = {style.shoe}>
            {/* Shoe */}
            <View style ={{height:'95%',width:150,paddingTop:15}}>
              <Text style = {{paddingBottom:SIZES.padding+5,color:'#ff00ff',...FONTS.h3}}>{item.date}</Text>
              <Image source={item.img} resizeMode = 'cover' style = {{height:100, width:150}}/>
            </View>
            <View style ={{height:'100%', width:'100%',flexDirection:"column"}}>
              <View style ={{width:'55%',height:'60%'}}>
                <Text style={{textTransform:'uppercase',...FONTS.body3,paddingTop:SIZES.body4,fontWeight:'bold'}}>{item.name}</Text>
              </View>
              <View style ={{height:'40%',width:'55%', flexDirection:'row'}}>
                <View style = {{width:'35%',alignItems:'center'}}>
                  <Text style = {{textTransform:'uppercase',fontWeight:'400',paddingVertical:6,fontSize:13 }}>retail</Text>
                  <Text style = {{fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:17}}>{item.retail}</Text>
                </View>
                <View style ={{width:'35%',alignItems:'center'}}>
                  <Text style = {{textTransform:'uppercase',fontWeight:'400',paddingVertical:6,fontSize:13 }}>resell</Text>
                  <Text style = {{fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:17,textTransform:'uppercase'}}>{item.resell}</Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>
      )
    }
    return (
      <View>
        <FlatList 
        data={shoes}
        renderItem = {renderData}
        showsVerticalScrollIndicator ={false}/>
      </View>
    )
  }

    return (
       <View style = {{flex: 1}}>
        {/* header */}
            <View style = {{height:"18%",width:"100%",backgroundColor:COLORS.black, borderBottomLeftRadius:20,borderBottomRightRadius:20}}>
              <View style = {{flexDirection:'row',height:'70%'}}>
                <View style= {{width:'60%',height:'100%'}}>
                  <Text style ={style.header}>RELEASES</Text>
                </View>
                <View style ={{height:'100%',width:'20%'}}>
                  <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => console.log("notification")} style = {{paddingLeft:SIZES.padding*2,paddingTop:SIZES.padding +10}}>
                    <Image source={icons.notification} resizeMode="contain" style={{height:37,width:37}}/>
                  </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
                <View style ={{height:'100%',width:'20%'}}>
                  <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => console.log("notification")} style = {{paddingLeft:SIZES.body3,paddingTop:SIZES.padding +10}}>
                    <Image source={icons.profile} resizeMode="contain" style={{height:37,width:37}}/>
                  </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
              </View>
              {/* search */}
              <View style = {style.label}>
              <Text style ={{paddingHorizontal:15,paddingTop:19}}>View</Text>
                <View style={{width:'87%',backgroundColor:'white',borderRadius:30,flexDirection:'row-reverse',shadowOpacity:0.35,shadowRadius:10}}>
                  <Text style={{paddingHorizontal:15,paddingTop:19}}>All Brands</Text>
                  <View style ={{width:'69%',backgroundColor:'white',borderRadius:30,shadowOpacity:0.35,shadowRadius:10,flexDirection:'row-reverse'}}>
                    <Text style ={{paddingHorizontal:15,paddingTop:19}}>Date</Text>
                    <View style={{backgroundColor:'#00ffff',borderRadius:40,width:'28%',left:'135%',height:'90%',top:'1.5%',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center'}}>
                    <Image source={icons.search} resizeMode = 'contain' style = {{height:25, width:25}}/>
                    </View>
                  </View>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
        {/* product */}
        <View style={{padding:29}}></View>
        <ScrollView>
          <View style = {{paddingHorizontal:15,paddingBottom:SIZES.base}}>
            {renderTabView ()}
          </View>
          <View>
            {renderDataTabView ()}
          </View>
        </ScrollView>
       </View>
    )
} 
const style = StyleSheet.create({
    container:{
        flex:1,
        backgroundColor:COLORS.white
    },
    header: {
      color:COLORS.white,
      ...FONTS.h1 ,
      fontSize:25,
      paddingLeft:SIZES.body1,
      paddingTop:SIZES.body1+15,
      fontWeight:'700',
      letterSpacing:3
    },
    label: {
      position:'absolute',
      backgroundColor:COLORS.white,
      borderRadius:35,
      height:60,
      flexDirection:"row-reverse",
      top:'76%',
      left:SIZES.padding+30,
      right:SIZES.padding,
      shadowRadius:10,
      shadowOpacity:0.15

    },
    releasesList: {
      flexDirection:'row',
      marginTop:SIZES.padding+6,
      marginBottom:SIZES.radius+8,
      justifyContent:'space-between'
    },
    buttonActive: {
      alignItems:'center',
      justifyContent:'center',
      height:30,
      width:110,
      borderBottomWidth:2,
      borderBottomColor:COLORS.black,
      
  },
  button:{
      alignItems:'center',
      justifyContent:'center',
      height:30,
      width:110,
      borderBottomWidth:2,
      borderBottomColor:COLORS.gray,
      
  },
  shoe:{
    flexDirection:'row', 
    borderRadius:30,
    backgroundColor:COLORS.white,
    paddingHorizontal:10, 
    height:160,
    width:'92%',  
    shadowOpacity:0.02,
    shadowRadius:10
  }
})
export default Home;
